```{r}
library(pixture)
library(dplyr)
here::i_am("lgrs/Cape-Town.qmd")
```

```{r}
#| output: asis

photos <- filter_flickr_photo(find = slc) |>
    pull_flickr_paths_captions(howmany = 1, preview = TRUE)

cat(sprintf("<center>\n%s\n<br/>\n%s<br/></center>", 
         photos$paths, photos$captions))
```


## Galería de fotos

```{r}
photos <- filter_flickr_photo(find = slc) |>
    pull_flickr_paths_captions()

pixgallery(photos$paths, caption=photos$captions)
```


## Observaciones en iNaturalist


```{r}
inat_photos <- filter_inat_photo(place=slc) |>
  pull_inat_paths_captions(howmany=18)

pixgallery(inat_photos$paths, caption=inat_photos$captions)
```
